narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Big Heart is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Brooklyn, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $86.7M in Medicaid payments across 614K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $86.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
